pages.name: Much of the settled domains are a lawless frontier. Criminal factions and corrupt leaders often hold sway.

system.Result: Much of the settled domains are a lawless frontier. Criminal factions and corrupt leaders often hold sway.
system.Description: Powers rise and fall in the Forge, so any authority is fleeting. In the end, we must fend for ourselves. A few communities are bastions of successful autonomy, but many are corrupted or preyed upon by petty despots, criminals, and raiders.
system.Summary: Much of the settled domains are a lawless frontier. Criminal factions and corrupt leaders often hold sway.
system.Quest: In the upper atmosphere of a gas giant, transport vehicles carry valuable and volatile fuel from the processing plant to a heavily guarded storage depot. The notorious leader of a criminal organization needs this fuel, and gives you the schedule for the transports. What leverage does this person hold over you? How will you undertake this heist?

Roll template.Description: Powers rise and fall in the Forge, so any authority is fleeting. In the end, we must fend for ourselves. A few communities are bastions of successful autonomy, but many are corrupted or preyed upon by petty despots, criminals, and raiders.

pages.name: Laws and governance vary across settled domains, but bounty hunters are given wide latitude to pursue their contracts. Their authority is almost universally recognized, and supersedes local laws.

system.Result: Laws and governance vary across settled domains, but bounty hunters are given wide latitude to pursue their contracts. Their authority is almost universally recognized, and supersedes local laws.
system.Description: Through tradition and influence, bounty hunter guilds are given free rein to track and capture fugitives in most settled places. Only the foolish stand between a determined bounty hunter and their target.
system.Summary: Laws and governance vary across settled domains, but bounty hunters are given wide latitude to pursue their contracts. Their authority is almost universally recognized, and supersedes local laws.
system.Quest: A famed bounty hunter needs your help tracking down their quarry. What is your relationship to the fugitive? Do you swear to aid the hunter, or the target?

Roll template.Description: Through tradition and influence, bounty hunter guilds are given free rein to track and capture fugitives in most settled places. Only the foolish stand between a determined bounty hunter and their target.

pages.name: Our communities are bound under the terms of the Covenant, a charter established after the Exodus. The organization called the Keepers is sworn to uphold those laws.

system.Result: Our communities are bound under the terms of the Covenant, a charter established after the Exodus. The organization called the Keepers is sworn to uphold those laws.
system.Description: Most settlements are still governed under the Covenant and yield to the authority of the Keepers. But a few view the Covenant as a dogmatic, impractical, and unjust relic of our past; in those places, the Keepers find no welcome.
system.Summary: Our communities are bound under the terms of the Covenant, a charter established after the Exodus. The organization called the Keepers is sworn to uphold those laws.
system.Quest: A Keeper abuses their authority to take control of a settlement, and rules with an iron fist. What do they seek to gain there?

Roll template.Description: Most settlements are still governed under the Covenant and yield to the authority of the Keepers. But a few view the Covenant as a dogmatic, impractical, and unjust relic of our past; in those places, the Keepers find no welcome.

text.markdown: If you chase down outlaws, you might be a @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedassets.9e8a91f52b96c95b]{Bounty Hunter}. If you are skilled at getting in and out of protected places and systems, you might be an @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedassets.1e03c8d44d0b3ffc]{Infiltrator}. If you are on the run from a power or authority, you might be a @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedassets.93b030423d23059d]{Fugitive}. If you an expert investigator, you might be a @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedassets.26787f46840c03ad]{Sleuth}. If you have connections within the criminal underworld, you might be a @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedassets.d7fbe5fded75531c]{Scoundrel}.
